this game will really rip your heart out it is an incredible game worth every penny in my opinion i loved the different characters the story line was unique and beautifully crafted the art was stunning and the music made everything all that much emotional my one time play through was over 7 hours and i do still have somethings i want to go back and redo to get the achievements eventually

i was emotionally in tune with the story from the first minute until the last i just wish they made this into an adventure game instead of a puzzle platformer because it really takes the attention away from the cast of quirky characters and the gorgeous animation i cant wait for forgotlings

wow what a journey  starting this game i was amazed by the beautiful graphics that had reminded me of hayao miyazakis masterpieces  and the more i was playing  the deeper was the story  adding here a beautiful music and nicely done scenario the game will remind you of almost every choice youve made and sometimes you will really regret of what youve done or said previously  for ones who love adventures  this is totally must have
its like watching a ghibli movie thoroughly enjoyed playing this now im waiting for the release of forgotlings

i liked playing this game a lot the art is so prettyyy
worth it for the world alone great art engaging story a few little bugs and cheesy moments but still 910 easy recommend

an interesting puzzle platformer with a studio ghibli esque artstyle and a studio ghibli style batshit insane story  thats not a criticism the story is good the platforming style will be familiar for anyone who has played games like limbo or inside   what forgotten anne does it does very well its charming has a really unique artstyle  the story lands well at approx 68 hours it doesnt overstay its welcome like puzzle games can
it is beautiful and intriguing a wonderful story
great graphic decent yet simple puzzles story is nothing new but overall an enjoyable time spent playing this

well if you have nephew to play forgotten anne together or a child then i recommend its like a cartoon movie i bought it after having read positive reviews but i wouldnt exaggerate as some of them did it is a good and fun game achievements are in general easy but there are couple of missable ones there are some good jokes and there are boring moments as well in general it is good i give 78 over 10

wonderfully written intricately designed story  choices matter i love games that have alternative endings andor choicebased results ive played the forgotten anne story line multiple times about 911 at this point i used to have this game on the ps4 about 5 years ago to this day i havent found a single game like it its unique its captivating its entertaining and beautifully animated my top favorite game 1110
a genuinely lovely little game it is not long but it is charming and touching  i recommend if you want a platformer with a really gorgeous art style

i love story based games but wasnt sure i would like the platforming aspect to this one my doubts were unfounded and this game is amazing the story line is terrific and i love that i can replay it and change the outcome based on my responses i am now on my second run through and im not sure i will ever get tired of it the characters were extremely well written and the voice actors were on point i am so excited to see what other games this developer creates
this was a masterpiece
